meanings.definition: In a manner related to socialism.
meanings.sent1: The community center operates socialistically, ensuring everyone has access to resources.
meanings.sent2: The group of friends shared their snacks socialistically during the picnic.
meanings.sent3: The ants worked socialistically to build their anthill, each carrying a tiny piece of food.
meanings.sent4: The music festival was organized socialistically, with volunteers contributing equally to its success.
meanings.sent5: The classroom was decorated socialistically, with students collaborating on colorful drawings for the walls.

meanings.definition: With a focus on social ownership and control of the means of production.
meanings.sent1: The company's socialistically structured policies ensured fair treatment of all workers.
meanings.sent2: The cooperative farm operated socialistically, with decisions made collectively by the farmers.
meanings.sent3: The socialistically managed factory ran smoothly, with profits shared among all employees.
meanings.sent4: The socialistically run bookstore prioritized community needs over individual profits.
meanings.sent5: The socialistically owned restaurant sourced ingredients locally to support nearby farmers.

meanings.definition: In a way that promotes social equality and collective ownership.
meanings.sent1: The charity event was organized socialistically, with donations benefiting the entire community.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood association functioned socialistically, ensuring all residents had a say in decisions.
meanings.sent3: The group project was completed socialistically, with each member contributing equally.
meanings.sent4: The socialistically managed park provided a space for all to enjoy nature together.
meanings.sent5: The socialistically planned event aimed to bring people together for a common cause.
